English: Dominion: Shields you once.#Upon disappearing removes bullets around you.
Japanese: Dominion: Shields you once. #Upon disappearing removes bullets around you.
Chinese: Dominion: Shields you once. #Upon disappearing removes bullets around you.

English: Paradox Shield: Shields you once.#Significantly reduces movement speed.#Upon breaking, grant Paradox Sword.
Japanese: Paradox Shield: Shields you once.#Significantly reduces movement speed.#Upon breaking, grant Paradox Sword.
Chinese: Paradox Shield: Shields you once.#Significantly reduces movement speed.#Upon breaking, grant Paradox Sword.

English: Paradox Sword: Your Primary deals 10% more damage.
Japanese: Paradox Sword: Your Primary deals 10% more damage.
Chinese: Paradox Sword: Your Primary deals 10% more damage.

English: Inferno: Afflicted enemies take 5% more damage.#Upon wearing off deals half the damage of the hit#that applied superburn.
Japanese: Inferno: Afflicted enemies take 5% more damage.#Upon wearing off deals half the damage of the hit#that applied superburn.
Chinese: Inferno: Afflicted enemies take 5% more damage.#Upon wearing off deals half the damage of the hit#that applied superburn.
